<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Assign a GUID to functions as metadata. GUID calculation takes linkage into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// account, which may change especially through and after thinlto. By</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// pre-computing and assigning as metadata, this mechanism is resilient to such</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// changes (as well as name changes e.g. suffix &quot;.llvm.&quot; additions).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME(mtrofin): we can generalize this mechanism to calculate a GUID early in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the pass pipeline, associate it with any Global Value, and then use it for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PGO and ThinLTO.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// At that point, this should be moved elsewhere.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assignguidpass"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assignguidpass/#aea9d1c52a94e44bfae70ed8b19f4c709">AssignGUIDPass</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/passinfomixin">PassInfoMixin</a>&lt;AssignGUIDPass&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assignguidpass/#aea9d1c52a94e44bfae70ed8b19f4c709"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">explicit</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assignguidpass/#aea9d1c52a94e44bfae70ed8b19f4c709">AssignGUIDPass</a>() = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Assign a GUID &#42;if&#42; one is not already assign, as a function metadata named</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#96;GUIDMetadataName&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses">PreservedAnalyses</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assignguidpass/#aa89d9261590d9a6a45bb5a02e907c32c">run</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;M, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af9c9208365fd9ce11392b4d79485e259">ModuleAnalysisManager</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#a85bddafa659a93a7a67c9094648259be">MAM</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assignguidpass/#a0d7de14ccfc0cc5b792c7ff03bff1170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assignguidpass/#a0d7de14ccfc0cc5b792c7ff03bff1170">GUIDMetadataName</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This should become GlobalValue::getGUID</span></CodeLine>
